sub_fields.label: How many boxes in a row?
sub_fields.name: how_many_boxes
sub_fields.instructions:
How many boxes in a row in desktop view.
Four - 270x270
Three - 370x370
Two - 570x570

sub_fields.label: More offers

sub_fields.instructions: If it is more than 4 it will display as a slider.
